title: Given to the Mafia Werebear
description: He was massive, rich, covered in tattoos, and completely ruthless. Even more, he had just finished transforming back into his human form.I was to let him do whatever he wanted to me. All because of my husband’s mistake. He never should have gotten involved in the Russian mafia, but if I ever wanted to feel safe again this was something I had to do.The thing is, I couldn’t wait to be used by some rugged man with the desires of an animal and this was just the opportunity I’d been waiting for.
author: Eve Singer
